SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.entity.Questions

Class ShortQuestionType

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.entity.Questions.QuestionTypeFactory
comp3111.examsystem.entity.Questions.ShortQuestionType
public final class ShortQuestionType extends QuestionTypeFactory
Singleton containing short question type validation and UI set-up related methods. As this class only contains utility methods, using singleton could reduce space due to class initialization.
Author:
Cheung Tuen King

      ShortQuestionType singleton instance

    • validateAnswer

      public String validateAnswer(String answer) throws Exception
      Validate answer for short question. Answer for short question should:
    • have text length in range (0, QuestionDatabase.ANSWER_LENGTH_LIMIT)
      • Specified by:
      validateAnswer in class QuestionTypeFactory
      Parameters:
      answer - Answer for validation
      Returns:
      Validated answer
      Throws:
      Exception - Any condition above is not met

    • validateOption

      public void validateOption(String option, int index) throws Exception
      Validate the option text. Short question should have all option empty
      Overrides:
      validateOption in class QuestionTypeFactory
      Parameters:
      option - Option text
      index - Integer 0 to 3 indicating option A to D
      Throws:
      Exception - Any option text is not empty

    • initialize

      public void initialize(javafx.scene.control.TextField[] fields, Question form) throws Exception
      Fill in the question form option UI based on the question given. As for short question, all option should be empty
      Overrides:
      initialize in class QuestionTypeFactory
      Parameters:
      fields - TextField for question form option
      form - Question entity for initialization
      Throws:
      Exception - Question option does not meet the validation rules. Visit QuestionTypeFactory.validateOption() for details

    • setUpForm

      public void setUpForm(javafx.scene.control.Label[] labels, javafx.scene.control.TextField[] fields, String[] options, javafx.scene.control.Label originalLabel, javafx.scene.control.TextField originalField)
      Set up the question form UI by setting, disabling or enabling the labels and text field guiding and inputting options. As for short question, all option TextField and Label should be disabled as all is predefined to be empty.
      Overrides:
      setUpForm in class QuestionTypeFactory
      Parameters:
      labels - Array of Label guiding options input
      fields - Array of TextField for inputting options
      options - Array for storing options
      originalLabel - Original Label as reference for resetting the modified Labels
      originalField - Original TextField as reference for resetting the modified TextFields

    • saveOptions

      public void saveOptions(javafx.scene.control.TextField[] fields, String[] options)
      Save the option text user inputted in question form UI before user changing the question type. As for short question, no option is saved as all of them are predefined to be empty.
      Overrides:
      saveOptions in class QuestionTypeFactory
      Parameters:
      fields - Array of TextField displaying option text
      options - Array for storing options
